scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node22 --outfile=dist/supercet.js --external:node-pty --external:*.node --minify --banner:js='if(typeof __filename==="undefined"){var __filename=process.execPath;var __dirname=require("path").dirname(__filename);}' --define:process.env.SUPERCET_VERSION='"'$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')'"' --define:process.env.SUPERCET_URL='"'$(grep SUPERCET_URL .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d '=' -f2 || echo 'https://supercet.com')'"' --define:process.env.DEBUG='"'$(grep DEBUG .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d '=' -f2  || echo 'false')'"' && node scripts/fix-import-meta.cjs
scripts.local: npm run build && npm run bundle:arm64
